head.supplied: 26 January 1869. ¶ ¶ Herewith, dear friend, still a belated New Year's greeting. Do let me know if you require any plants for your garden from here in April or May. Hoping that you and yours are well...

div.p: MS papers 37, folder 208, no. 578, Haast family papers, Alexander Turnbull Library, Wellington.

Hiermit, theuerer Freund, noch ein verspäteter Neujahrsgruss. Lassen Sie mich doch wissen, ob im April oder Mai Sie Pflanzen von hieraus für Ihren Garten bedürfen. Hoffend dass Sie u die Ihren wohl sind bleibe

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Herewith, dear friend, still a belated New Year's greeting. Do let me know if you require any plants for your garden from here in April or May. Hoping that you and yours are well, I remain

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
